concept.title: INTRODUCTION
concept.shortdesc: How to Use the Cuisinart Ice-60W:

conbody.p: Welcome and congratulations on your decision to use the Cuisinart ICE-60W located in Shanks Hall! This machine is the perfect solution to a late-night studying craving or a midday pick-me-up in between classes. With over 11 ice cream recipes possible, as well as additional alternative cold dessert options, this appliance is a great addition to classroom 360. In this manual you will find step-by-step instructions detailing how to prepare, use, and clean the Cuisinart ICE-60W and three delicious ice-cream recipes for you to try.
For additional information and more recipes, including dietary restricted alternatives, please visit: Cuisinart.com
